name: Cloudian Sky Sanctuary
text: Battle damage to the controller of a "Cloudian" monster from a battle involving a "Cloudian" monster becomes 0. Once per turn, if a "Cloudian" monster on your field is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Cloudian" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, then place 2 Fog counters on each monster on the field. If this card would be destroyed you can remove 2 Fog counters from the field instead. You can remove up to 2 Fog counters from the field; You can Normal Summon "Cloudian" monsters additional times this turn up to the number of Fog counters removed for this effect (You can only gain this effect once per turn).
